docs.snippet: Week Ended Dec. 16, 1960 Foreign exchange market turned soft during the past week. British pound sterling and Canadian dollar were very active at times.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 20 (UPI) -- A proposal to invoke limited economic sanctions against the Dominican Republic will be placed before the Organization of American States tomorrow.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 20 (UPI) -- A proposal to invoke limited economic sanctions against the Dominican Republic will be placed before the Organization of American States tomorrow.

docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Dec. 20 -- Following are the roll-call votes by which the General Assembly rejected today a proposal a nthe Congo question sponsored by six Asian and African nations and Yugoslavia and Ceylon, and one by the United States and Britain. Both required a two-thirds vote for adoption.
docs.abstract: opposes Nkrumah plan for African command

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 21 -- The Organization of American States decided today to postpone until Jan. 4 a vote on the question of imposing limited economic sanctions against the Dominican Republic.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 21 -- The Organization of American States decided today to postpone until Jan. 4 a vote on the question of imposing limited economic sanctions against the Dominican Republic.
docs.abstract: postpones action until Jan 4 as some Council members resist sanctions

headline.main: O.A.S. DEFERS VOTE ON TRUJILLO ISSUE; Action on Economic Curbs Put Off to Jan. 4 as Some Latin Nations Resist

byline.original: By E.W. KENWORTHYSpecial to The New York Times

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 24 (AP) -- President Eisenhower accepted today the resignation of Dempster McIntosh as Ambassador to Colombia, effective Dec. 31.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 24 (AP) -- President Eisenhower accepted today the resignation of Dempster McIntosh as Ambassador to Colombia, effective Dec. 31.

docs.snippet: Russia was no threat to the American way of basketball life, and went the way of the rest of the opposition to the United, States team in the Olympic Games. The best bet at Rome last summer was a United States victory in the roundball sport and it...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia was no threat to the American way of basketball life, and went the way of the rest of the opposition to the United, States team in the Olympic Games. The best bet at Rome last summer was a United States victory in the roundball sport and it was no surprise at all that the tall and talented squad coached by California's Pete Newell swept eight games.

headline.main: Basketball; Race Betting and Attendance Rise; Kelso and Adios Butler Horses of Year

docs.snippet: Week Ended Dec. 23, 1960 Rates for foreign exchanges were on the soft side during the past week. Canadian dollar turned weak on an announcement of a deficit budget and the resumption of a tax program. Business turnover was fairly heavy at times.
